activities: Ogangi collects and uses personal information to provide high quality customer service, to provide convenient access to Our products and services, and to make customers aware of the latest offerings from Ogangi. We only use information for the purposes for which it is gathered for and we take reasonable precautions to maintain the reliability of such information.
personaldata: Information provided during the registration processes such as email, name and other contact information. When contacting our support organization we collect personally identifiable information regarding the inquiry, such as name, email address or telephone number.
privacyprograms: Council of Better Business Bureaus(CBBB) http://www.seflorida.bbb.org/
recoursemech: Ogangi has further committed to refer unresolved privacy complaints under the US-EU and US-Swiss Safe Harbor Principles to an independent dispute resolution mechanism, the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR, operated by the Council of Better Business Bureaus. If you do not receive timely acknowledgment of your complaint, or if Ogangi does not satisfactorily address your complaint, please visit the BBB EU SAFE HARBOR web site at www.bbb.org/us/safe-harbor-complaints for more information and to file a complaint.
